name: Dampened Spirits
location: Whiterun — Honningbrew Meadery / Riften — Bee and Barb
description: Maven Black-Briar orders the collapse of Honningbrew Meadery by exposing Sabjorn's corruption and ensuring the brew is ruined. The job must stay deniable while preserving Maven's inside contact, Mallus.

objectives.description: Infiltrate Honningbrew and reach Mallus without exposing the Guild.
Secure Sabjorn's incriminating documents and the poison vial.
Stage evidence to ensure Sabjorn is blamed (skeever infestation framing).
Poison the vats to destroy Honningbrew's product and reputation.
Preserve Mallus as a viable asset and return to Maven with receipts.

notes: Turn-in to Maven produced a concrete Arisann lead tied to a courier lattice ('Ivory Thread'). Contact: Hroldar 'Whitefin'. Meet: Nightgate Pass (The Pale). Passphrase exchange established.

compels: A Justiciar insists on 'procedure' at the worst possible moment
Evidence is good—but paper trails are dangerous
